self.name: channels.getAdminedPublicChannels
self.description: Get channels/supergroups/geogroups we're admin in. Usually called when the user exceeds the config for owned public channels/supergroups/geogroups, and the user is given the choice to remove one of their channels/supergroups/geogroups.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Get channels/supergroups/geogroups we're admin in. Usually called when the user exceeds the...

arguments.name: checkLimit
arguments.description:
If set and the user has reached the limit of owned public channels/supergroups/geogroups, instead of returning the channel list one of the specified channels.getAdminedPublicChannels will be returned.
Useful to check if a new public channel can indeed be created, even before asking the user to enter a channel username to use in channels.checkUsername/channels.updateUsername.

throws.description: Returned if both the check_limit and the by_location flags are set and the user has reached the limit of public geogroups
throws.name: CHANNELS_ADMIN_LOCATED_TOO_MUCH

throws.description: Returned if the check_limit flag is set and the user has reached the limit of public channels/supergroups
throws.name: CHANNELS_ADMIN_PUBLIC_TOO_MUCH
